intro: Knowltonia caffra, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant has fleshy, dark green leaves and produces clusters of tubular flowers that bloom throughout the year. It thrives in moist, well-drained soil and requires bright, indirect light for optimal growth. Knowltonia caffra is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
